snippet: The former "Saturday Night Live" cast mates Tina Fey, now the creator and star of NBC's "30 Rock," and Amy Poehler, who stars on "Parks and Recreation," will co-host the Golden Globes ceremony on Jan. 13.
abstract: The former "Saturday Night Live" cast mates Tina Fey, now the creator and star of NBC's "30 Rock," and Amy Poehler, who stars on "Parks and Recreation," will co-host the Golden Globes ceremony on Jan. 13.

headline.main: Amy Poehler and Tina Fey to Host Golden Globe Awards
headline.print_headline: Poehler and Fey to Host Golden Globe Awards
